attributes.action: For paedophiles to receive substantially increased sentences with mandatory treatment and no parole.  Reoffenders be jailed for LIFE.
attributes.additional_details: As paedophiles cannot be cured, then sentencing should be urgently and strongly reviewed so that their jail sentences are substantially increased with no parole and they should receive mandatory treatment.  Paedophiles that reoffend should be jailed for life, and mean life.  The government should make sure, 100%, that these people are not released onto our streets whilst they are a risk and danger to our precious children.  Our children need to be kept safe and happy always.
